com.topcoder.util.sql.databaseabstraction
Class OnDemandMapper

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.util.sql.databaseabstraction.OnDemandMapper
public class OnDemandMapper
extends java.lang.Object

The OnDemandMapper class is the main focal point of the version 1.1 additions to this component. The OnDemandMapper is similar to the Mapper class, but contains a set of OnDemandConverters (and since they can be used on any column, no map from column names is needed). Additionally, it exposes a more type-safe set of methods than the Mapper class.

Thread Safety: - This class is mutable, and not thread-safe.

Since:
1.1
Version:
1.1
Author:
aubergineanode, justforplay

Constructor Detail

OnDemandMapper

public OnDemandMapper()

Creates a new OnDemandMapper, which initially has no converters available.

OnDemandMapper

public OnDemandMapper(OnDemandConverter[] converters)

Creates a new OnDemandMapper with the initial list of converters. All of the elements of converters argument are added to the converters field.

Parameters:
converters - The converters that are initially part of the mapper.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If converters is null or contains null items.
Method Detail

addConverter

public boolean addConverter(OnDemandConverter converter)

Adds a converter to the set of converters in the mapper. Adds the item to the converters set.

Parameters:
converter - The converter to add
Returns:
True if the converter was added. False if already in the mapper
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If converter is null

removeConverter

public boolean removeConverter(OnDemandConverter converter)

Removes a converter from the set of converters in the mapper.

Parameters:
converter - The converter to remove
Returns:
True if the converter was removed, false if it was not in the mapper.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If converter is null

getConverters

public OnDemandConverter[] getConverters()

Gets all converters in the mapper. Returns the converters set as an OnDemandConverter[].

Returns:
All items in the converters set, as an array

canConvert

public boolean canConvert(java.lang.Object value,
                          int column,
                          CustomResultSetMetaData metaData,
                          java.lang.Class desiredType)

Determines whether this mapper can convert a value in a CustomResultSet to the requested type.

Parameters:
value - The value to convert
column - The column in the result set the value came from
metaData - The metadata for the result set (allows information about the column to be looked up)
desiredType - The type to convert the result to
Returns:
True if some converter can handle the conversion, false if none can
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If metaData, desiredType is null

convert

public java.lang.Object convert(java.lang.Object value,
                                int column,
                                CustomResultSetMetaData metaData,
                                java.lang.Class desiredType)
                         throws IllegalMappingException

Converts value into an instance of desiredType (or implementation of it, if desiredType is an interface).

Parameters:
value - The value to convert
column - The column in the result set that value came from
metaData - The metadata for the result set that value came from
desiredType - The desired return type
Returns:
value converted to the desired type
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If metaData or desiredType is null
IllegalMappingException - If the mapping can not be performed by any converter, or a converter claims to be able to handle the conversion, but fails when doing it

clearConverters

public void clearConverters()

Clears the converters set, removing all converters associated with the mapper.

createDefaultOnDemandMapper

public static OnDemandMapper createDefaultOnDemandMapper()

Creates an OnDemandMapper configured with the default OnDemandConversions. That is, one of each of the converters in the com.topcoder.util.sql.databaseabstraction.ondemandconversion namespace .

Returns:
An OnDemandMapper configured with the default converters
